      • DoubleBounceMissile

        public DoubleBounceMissile​(double x,
                           double y,
                           double direction,
                           int levelSizeX,
                           int levelSizeY,
                           int delay,
                           Level level)
        Constructs a new DoubleBounceMissile, Sets speed and bounces
        Parameters:
        x - the x coordinate of the DoubleBounceMissile (top left)
        y - the y coordinate of the DoubleBounceMissile (top left)
        direction - the direction the DoubleBounceMissile is moving in
        levelSizeX - the x size of the Level
        levelSizeY - the y size of the Level
        delay - the delay between frames
        level - the Level that the DoubleBounceMissile is in
